entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call is important to us. Please wait while we connect you with an agent.
Thank you for calling VeloFit, this is Sarah, how can I help you today?
Hi Sarah, I recently received a bike from you, order number VF1234, and I'm afraid it arrived damaged. I think I need to return it.
I'm so sorry to hear that your bike arrived damaged. Could you describe the damage for me?

Yes, the bike box had a pretty big dent in it, and when I opened it, the bike's frame... the **cracked frame** was immediately visible. Also, the **wobbly wheel** just looks completely out of alignment.

I understand. That sounds very frustrating, and I apologize for the inconvenience caused by the **shipping damage**. We want to make this right for you immediately. To resolve this, I'm going to issue a full refund for the bike right away.
Oh, really? That would be great!
Absolutely. Additionally, we'll send you a **free label** to return the damaged bike to us. You won't have to pay for any of the return shipping costs.
Wow, that's fantastic! How do I get the free shipping label?

I've already emailed you the **free label**. You should receive it within the next few minutes. Just print it out, attach it to the original packaging, and drop it off at your nearest shipping carrier location.
Okay, perfect! I really appreciate you taking care of this so quickly and easily.
You're very welcome! We value your business and are truly sorry that you had this experience with VeloFit. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's everything. Thank you so much for your help, Sarah!
You're very welcome! Have a great day!
